name: Luxe Nomad Pte Ltd
description: Operator of a booking portal and management company intended to help tourists in booking hotels and villas at their destinations. The company's platform offers a list of luxurious hotels and villas in different places all over the world, enabling tourists to find comfortable and cheap resting places for their vacations or official tours.
one_liner: Operator of a booking portal and management company intended to help tourists in booking hotels and villas at their destinations.
